lead_paragraph: Olympic athletes who bring home the gold, silver and bronze for Team USA will no longer pay a "victory tax" for their achievement under a bill President Barack Obama signed into law Friday.

headline.main: Obama Ends 'Victory Tax' on Some US Olympic Athletes
headline.print_headline: Obama Ends 'Victory Tax' on Some US Olympic Athletes

snippet: Olympic athletes who bring home the gold, silver and bronze for Team USA will no longer pay a "victory tax" for their achievement under a bill President Barack Obama signed into law Friday....
